channel.title: AFL on The New Golden Hammer
channel.description: Recent content in AFL on The New Golden Hammer

item.title: Simulation Stimulation: AFL Season 2018
item.description: Recently I was, as I am (unfortunately) rather wont to do, aimlessly watching YouTube videos when I came across these two videos by Numberphile. Here, the authors discuss their attempts at modelling and simulating seasons of the English Premier League. As an avid AFL fan, and with the upcoming season fast approaching (edit, now underway, carn the cats!), why not try to apply these methods to the AFL season. This post will be the first of a three part series.
